data.message: Hello Facebook , Please i have a question how can  I merge two accounts ? Also how and when I can get verified of a page ? Cant I get it without promoting it cause i have  no money as other magazines! Please give me clear answers to my quetions dear ! Thank you !

replies.message: Hi Khaled. We don't currently offer a way to merge two accounts. Learn more from our Help Center: http://on.fb.me/1I4W2vk. At this time, we are only accepting verification requests from Pages that represent celebrities, public figures, sports teams, media and entertainment. Learn more here: http://on.fb.me/1I4W2vi. Hope this helps. -Sidney
